CustomField.formula:
( ((Class_of_Business_Factor__c + Number_of_Years_in_Business_Factor__c + Mgmt_quality_Board_Comp_Factor__c + M_A_activity_Factor__c + Pvt_Plcmnt_or_Pub_Exempt_Filing_Factor__c + Cap_Table_Composition_Factor__c + Major_Shareholder_Exposure_Factor__c + Equity_and_Debt_Structure_Factor__c + Debt_to_Equity_Position_factor__c + Current_Ratio_Factor__c + Earnings_Trend_Factor__c + Bank_Credit_Compliance_Factor__c + Auditor_Factor__c + Prior_D_O_Claims_Activity_Factor__c + Sublimit_for_Insured_Persons_Factor__c + Deriv_Demand_Investigation_Cost_Factor__c + Reputational_Protection_Factor__c + Loss_Mitigation_Factor__c + Subpoena_or_Document_Production_Factor__c)/19)
+
((EPLI_Class_Of_Business_Factor__c + EPLI_Number_of_Years_In_Business_Factor__c + EPLI_Location_Factor__c + EPLI_Prior_Yr_Employee_Turnover_Factor__c + EPLI_M_A_Activity_Prior_2_Yrs_Factor__c + EPLI_At_Will_Statement_Factor__c + EPLI_Employee_Handbook_Factor__c + EPLI_Annual_Performance_Reviews_Factor__c + EPLI_Harassment_Training_Factor__c + EPLI_Full_Time_HR_Pro_Factor__c + EPLI_Profitability_Factor__c + EPLI_Debt_to_Equity_Factor__c + EPLI_Prior_Claims_Activity_Factor__c + EPLI_3rd_Party_Exposure_Factor__c + EPLI_Immigration_Violation_Factor__c + EPLI_Wage_Hour_Factor__c)/16)
+
((Type_of_Plans_Factor__c + Years_in_Business_Factor__c + Number_of_participants_Factor__c + M_A_Activity_FID_Factor__c + Industry_Factor__c + Company_Performance_Factor__c + Plan_Compliance_Factor__c + Benefit_Reduc_Plan_Termin_Factor__c + Plan_funding_Factor__c + Plan_manager_quality_Factor__c + Prior_FID_Claim_Activity_Factor__c + FID_Voluntary_compliance_Factor__c)/12) ) /3
CustomField.label: Rating Factor
